name: Flip Against The Frontier
description:
Flip Against The Frontier is a thrilling action arcade pinball game that takes place inside The Frontier, an infamously challenging pinball machine. Navigate and survive by smashing robots, building gizmos, and reaching new high scores.

THE TEAM

Producer - Quincy Gomes-Cedeno

Lead Designer - Natalie Basile

Designer - Joshua Guptill

Environment Artist - Maddi Kane

Character Artist - Justin Bissonette

Lead Programmer - Joseph Lyons

Programmer - Dillon Drummond

Programmer - Tuck Tucker

Other Contributors

Sound Designer - Maxim Rasnovski

Sound Designer - Graham Sullivan

Main Music - Andrew Alford

External Resources

Font - Digital Dot Roadsign

Character Animations - Mixamo

Materia Icons - game-icons.net

SFX - Epidemic Sound, freesounds.org, overpwn

This game was developed for the 2023 Ubisoft Game Lab Competition. The theme was "ARCADE" with the following mandates: an online leaderboard, creation and destruction mechanics, at least one gravity modulation element, created in Unity3D or Unreal, have a minimum of 10 minutes of gameplay, and it must be playable on a maximum of 2 screens/PCs.
